name: Ultimate Experience: Cynicism
desc: After allies use an attack, there is a 40% base chance to inflict the Dissociation state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of 1 time(s) per enemy target per battle.
enhanced_desc: After allies use an attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict the Dissociation state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of 1 time(s) per enemy target per battle.
